tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crowdfunding_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_goal DECIMAL,
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE,
    contributor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contribution_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    goal_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    current_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE contributions (
    contribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backer_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    contribution_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    backer_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  goal_amount FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE contributor (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  total_contributions FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE contribution (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  contributor_id INT,
  amount FLOAT,
  contribution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE reward (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  description VARCHAR(255),
  reward_type VARCHAR(50),
  value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE pledge (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contributor_id INT,
  reward_id INT,
  amount FLOAT,
  pledge_date DATE
)
